name: Open eBook File
summary: Learn about .OEB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The OEB standard was maintained by the Open eBook Forum, which is now the International Digital Publishing Forum (IDPF).

description: Electronic publication created in the legacy Open eBook (OEB) format, which was used by some publishers and eBook readers; contains the book index, chapters, and page content; superseded by the .EPUB format.
